attributes.review: I downloaded this app and when I did everyone dropped dead around me, I was horrified at the scene and I was about to call the cops when all the sudden my phone bursted into flames. I worked so hard for that phone for 10 years, it was my pride and joy. Now I’m depressed, and while I’m typing this review rn I’m currently on the suicide bridge ready to end it all. But if this app gets taken down my depression will leave me. Please take this app away before I take my life away.
attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER!

attributes.review: I came here to see what my grandparents were soooo hyped about you for,and let’s just say I AM NOT IMPRESSED WITH THE APP if you want younger people you must make it so younger people not hate your guts and the app runs slower then my brain does on English class it took a whole week! A WHOLE WEEK to download as I said not impressed and idk why my grandparents like you so much but shame shame absolutely positively shameful to call u my president when u can even run an app right shame just shame.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE JUST TERRIBLE

attributes.review: I think this app is a horrible made app needs a lot of fixing like taking the whole app down.. just gotta day that this orange 🍊 looking dumb*ss mf should not be in charge of doing anything at the moment especially since he’s doing nothing for the black community, and nothing to keep our life safe in the whole quarantine situation.. so I howl you like that and I hope you know this app is just one more way he’s not helping himself with anything he needs to be
attributes.title: ✨bussy✨

attributes.review: first of all if you download this app for “news” and don’t think it’s going to be bias and only show things they want you to see, you’re kidding yourself. second of all, the one thing i started to love is the app TikTok, I have learned more about our planet, skin care, art, politics, etc on that app then ever before. It brings me amusement and you’re ripping it out of our hands just because you’re scared. Man up Trump, stop taking away our joy because you mess up.
attributes.title: SAVE TIKTOK

attributes.review: Horrible app. Absolutely disappointed in what Donald Trump has to offer. Can not be more disgusted in him. If you have a brain then it is easy to see why we must vote him out of office, but people who have no sense of self will continue to support him and his stupid mistakes. It is not too late to vote someone else and fix this mistake that America has made. “Make America Great Again” but when has it ever been great. Please come to your senses, do your research, and vote a better candidate.
attributes.title: Horrified

attributes.review: This app is so awful!!!!! Like who would want to ACTUALLY download this and support the big, stupid, ugly, racist, cheetoh looking President??? I swear some people don’t have brains. Anyways, I got a really bad on my phone from this app and I’m currently writing this review on my brother’s phone. Want a virus that will completely erase ALL data off your phone? Just download this one :) this app is garbage and I feel sorry for anyone who downloaded this, trying to support the stupid fat man in office.
attributes.title: Foreigner 💞🧚‍♂️

attributes.review: when i downloaded the app i was immediately dissapointed. it unleashed a virus on my phone, and all i could see were advertisements for false information and fascist people. as a mother of four, i am not happy that this app is exposed to my beloved children. i tremble at the horrid thought of the people who enjoy this app. the glitches made my phone close to blowing up! if i could i would rate this negative stars, i really would. i am truly appalled. 👎an update or upgrade would not even be able to fix this dumb app. i had communicated with my other peers and buddies on facebook messenger and we all agree how utterly stupid this app is. it would be great to see it taken down. my phone is so broken my caps do not seem to work!
attributes.title: worst app possible

attributes.review: This app took a week and a half jsut to download 👺 if that wasn’t enough once the app did download when I opened it up I saw many naked rats dancing as to I guess welcome me? What the flip? 😓👁👄👁 oh and let’s not forget that once I saw those cReaTures dancing many rats began to crawl from my ceiling and began to dance to the music of the other rats!! I was terrified barely escaped with my life! And one more thing r-r-rolled  up🤩to the party with my crazy 😝 pink wig 😼 but can’t get through the 🚪 because my bootys 😳 to big
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: I will never download this app or anything like it ever again. I saw the bad reviews, but I decided to download it anyways. Wayyyy too many ads, wayyy to many in-app purchases. The language on this app was very inappropriate VERY inappropriate. Every time I go on the app I’m covered knee deep with Hate speech and racial slurs. So much vulgarity!! This app also tried to get me to buy drugs (it was an ad) Cocaine to be specific!! If you don’t want to be disappointed, hurt, or upset, DO NOT get this app.
attributes.title: Terrible your honor terrible...

attributes.review: Don’t even try to download this app it’s the worst app ever it is very slow and tells all the lies Trump dose the points are fake and everything is I don’t like this app at all and I will never download this again i also almost got my phone hacked because of the amount of people on here I got scared to DEATH I didn’t want my phone hacked at all I hate this app with all my heart and I also hate trump please do not download this app I’m warning you!!
attributes.title: 100% do not recommend
